summary: The diff shows partial implementation of IC deployment requirements. Migration infrastructure and frontend path updates are present, but critical deployment configuration files (dfx.json, Vite build config) and GitHub Pages cleanup are not visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure dfx.json with proper canister definitions for both backend (Motoko) and frontend (React) canisters with appropriate build settings
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json file appears in the diff (neither added nor modified)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure frontend build process generates proper Candid declarations and environment variables for canister IDs
missing_requirements.reason: No Vite configuration file (vite.config.ts) changes visible in diff. frontend/.env.example added shows canister ID placeholders but no build process configuration for generating declarations

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove GitHub Pages deployment configuration including .github/workflows/deploy.yml and frontend/public/.nojekyll files
missing_requirements.reason: No file removals shown in diff summary (REMOVED FILES: none). Neither .github/workflows/deploy.yml nor frontend/public/.nojekyll appear as removed

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration.mo module with migration logic
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration module was not requested in BuildRequest. REQ-3 only requires verifying stable variables exist, not implementing migration infrastructure

hallucinated_features.description: Modified urlParams.ts utility with hash routing removal logic
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Do not modify immutable frontend paths' but urlParams.ts appears modified. Changes to routing utilities were not requested
